title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: Rainy city driving with almost stopped ego vehicle at intersection, other cars and pedestrians nearby.

reasoning: Ego vehicle is almost stopped at intersection because of the rainy weather, which reduces visibility and makes driving more challenging. The ego vehicle is maintaining a safe distance from other cars and pedestrians, and is prepared to stop or turn as needed. The presence of multiple vehicles and pedestrians in the area requires the ego vehicle to be extra cautious and vigilant to avoid any accidents.
